extensionDescription.message: Quick waka go anoda Wikipedia language page sharp-sharp.

languageInstruction.message: Put di WP code dem (di part wey dey before .wikipedia.org) wey you wan use, separate dem wit comma. Example: 'en' na English, 'es' na Spanish.

settingsDisplayMode.message: How you wan make di language show:

displayNative.message: Di language name wey dem sabi

customLabelNote.message: Put ya own label for each language (e.g. ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡¬, ä¸­æ–‡, ENG). If you no put anything, WP code go show.
